descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a large grid with shapes of three different colors on a colored background
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...remove the small shape and replicate it over each block of the same color as its center and color in the row or column of the blocks that extend from the shape to the edge of the colored area it is within for the blocks around the center of the small shape that are two blocks wide or two blocks tall and touch the sides of the center of the shape

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a large grid with boxes, a shape and three different colors.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...identical to the input grid.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...Copy the shape you see outside of the boxes. Take note of the center square of the shape outside the box. Position the shape in the box, centered over the the single squares in the boxes that are a different color. Next, take note of the squares that extend two spaces out from the center of the shape. Now, using the same color as these squares, continue their lines until they touch the sides of the colored box. Don't go into the background color. Repeat these steps for all boxes with a different colored square inside.

descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...remove the small shape and replicate it over each block of the same color as its center and color in the row or column of the blocks that extend from the shape to the edge  the colored area it is within for the blocks around the center of the small shape that are two blocks wide or two blocks tall and touch the sides of the center of the shape.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...fill with blue and put line through square.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...stay the same.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...change the green to red.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...large grid
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...input size grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...blocks tall and touch
